Actions.Name: Add new party
Actions.Description: Adds a new party to the document as a signatory, viewer or approver.

Actions.Name: Get document PDF file content
Actions.Description: Gets the content of the document PDF file.

Actions.Name: Create new document from template
Actions.Description: Create a new document from the selected template.

Actions.Name: Create new document from PDF
Actions.Description: Creates a document from a PDF file.

Actions.Name: Set attachment
Actions.Description: Adds a PDF to a document as an attachment. Choose between existing attachments from your Scrive account or create a new attachment by providing a PDF file.

Actions.Name: Set file for document
Actions.Description: Sets the main PDF file for the document.

Actions.Name: When a document is signed by all signatories (Start Signing)
Actions.Description: Starts the signing process for a document and waits for it to be signed.

Actions.Name: Start signing process
Actions.Description: Start the signing process for a document.

Actions.Name: Update document JSON
Actions.Description: Updates the document JSON with a provided JSON.

Actions.Name: Update fields based on template
Actions.Description: Updates party fields based on the selected template.

Actions.Name: Update properties of parties based on template
Actions.Description: Updates properties based on the selected template.

Actions.Name: When a document from template is signed by all signatories
Actions.Description: Watches a template and waits for one of its documents to be signed.

Actions.Name: When a document is signed by all signatories
Actions.Description: Waits for a document to be signed.
